body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Wilson's Martial Arts School. My name is Christopher Wilson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Madison Lee. How can I help you?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is madison.lee@example.com and my phone number is one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm curious about the class schedule for beginners. Can you provide me with more information about that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Madison. We offer beginner classes three times a week. Would you like the specific days and times?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, please. That would be helpful.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Our beginner classes are held on Monday and Wednesday at six to seven thirty in the evening, and on Saturday from ten to eleven thirty in the morning.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great, thanks for the information. Do you offer any free trial classes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Yes, Madison, we do offer a one free trial class for new students to experience our program. Would you be interested in trying it out?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds fantastic. I will definitely take advantage of that. Thanks for all your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Madison. Thank you for reaching out. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
